name: Lunchbox (Phyrol, CG115, Yvridio)
description:
Description:

You're the captain of a ship and have forgotten your lunch box back on shore. However, a wild storm has begun and there are many obstacles between you and the dock. Can you make it back alive to collect the special lunch your mother has made just for you?

(Made for 2021 Global Game Jam. Theme was "Lost".)

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Team Members:

Bradley Potzka - Systems

Christian Gonzalez - Systems

Connor Pillsbury - Water and Boat Physics

Nick Nguyen - Voice Acting
